testcase.name: Address Creation
testcase.system-out: * url 'https://demo.spreecommerce.org' .................................... passed * header Accept = 'aaplication/json' ...................................... passed * header Content-Type = ' application/vnd.api+json' ....................... passed * def AccessFeatureFile = call read('AccessToken.feature') ................ passed * def AccessToken = AccessFeatureFile.AccessToken ......................... passed Given header Authorization = 'Bearer '+ AccessToken ....................... passed Given path '/api/v2/storefront/account/addresses' ......................... passed And def requestbody = read('POST_CreateAddress.json') ..................... passed And request requestbody ................................................... passed When method POST .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And print response ........................................................ passed * def AddressId = response.data.id ........................................ passed And print AddressId ....................................................... passed
